title: TV Doctor Punam Krishan Shares Her Breast Cancer Story
summary: Punam Krishan is a TV doctor who was on a dancing show. She found out she had breast cancer five months ago. Breast cancer is a sickness that can affect people. She finished her treatment and is getting better now. Punam said it was very hard and scary to be sick, even though she is a doctor who helps others. She kept it private to protect her children and family. Her husband and friends helped her a lot. Punam shared her story on Instagram to be honest and show that life can be tough. She is grateful for the NHS team that took care of her.

background_read: Breast cancer is a common illness where cells in the breast grow too fast and can make people sick. Doctors like Punam Krishan work to help patients, but sometimes they get sick too. Treatment can include medicine, surgery, or other care to fight the cancer. Sharing stories can help others feel less alone when they are sick.
